biotools.summary: NeuroDevSim is a Neural Development Simulator for Linux of MacOS environments. It is a parallel and phenomenological computational framework to grow large numbers of neuronal morphologies (and resultant microcircuits) simultaneously according to growth-rules expressed in terms of interactions with the environment and internal variables:.
